channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Quick Share Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Quick Share Agent

item.title: CVE-2023-21462|2024-08-02T09:36:34.479Z -- samsung%20mobile -- quick%20share%20agent
item.description: The sensitive information exposure vulnerability in Quick Share Agent prior to versions 3.5.14.18 in Android 12 and 3.5.16.20 in Android 13 allows to local attacker to access MAC address without related permission.
